vocabinfos.lsjDefs:
Ζοροβάβελ (FlJ, Ζοροβάβηλος, -ου), ὁ indecl. (Heb. זְרֻבָּבֶל),
Zerubbabel (1Ch.3:19, al.): Mat.1:12-13 Luk.3:27.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time ofExile and return, only mentioned at Luk.3.27;
son of: Shealtiel (G4528);
father of: Rhesa (G4488)
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
所羅巴伯 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "生於巴比倫"
於波斯王塞魯士元年, 帶領第一批猶大百姓從巴比倫歸回以色列的領袖 (太 1:12-13; 路 3:27)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
所罗巴伯这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是"生于巴比伦"
于波斯王塞鲁士元年, 带领第一批犹大百姓从巴比伦归回以色列的领袖(太1 :12-13; 路3:27)
vocabinfos._vi_Definition: Xô-rô-ba-bên « sanh tại Ba-bên, tức Ba-by-lôn » Xem H2216

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Exile and Return, first mentioned at 1Ch.3.19;
son of: Pedaiah (H6305H);
brother of: Shimei (H8096J);
father of: Meshullam (H4918H), Hananiah (H2608L), Shelomith (H8019I), Hashubah (H2807), Ohel (H0169), Berechiah (H1296), Hasadiah (H2619), Jushab-hesed (H3142) and Abiud (G0010); also called Sheshbazzar at Ezr.1.8,11; 5.14,16; KJV: Zorobabel at Mat.1.12,13;
